EmailTemplate.description: Audit - Return to Study Reminder (Past Date)
EmailTemplate.name: Audit - Return to Study Reminder (Past Date)
EmailTemplate.subject: Audit - Return to Study Reminder (Past Date) - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Student,
An audit of student records revealed that to date your Return to Study form for your last approved [variation type] was not received when you resumed studies.
You can now complete your return form online. Please proceed to the online forms page at https://gradresearchforms.apps.monash.edu/. And select ‘Return Form’.
Can you please complete this as a matter of urgency as it is important that your student record is adjusted to accurately reflect your status.
Should you have already submitted the ‘Return Form’, please let us know.
If you have any concerns or wish to discuss this matter further, you are most welcome to contact us on (03) 9905 3050.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve
Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
